comments.body: It should be `indexFile` as we get only one file (either html or md) but not both at once. Moreover it would never be files becuase of assertion in line 25

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +26,30 @@      val msg = s"ERROR: Multiple root index pages found: ${files.map(_.getAbsolutePath)}"
      report.error(msg)
    files

  def hasIndexFile = indexFiles.nonEmpty
